value.halfverse: how many there are who rise up against me!
value.verse: LORD, how many adversaries I have! *

value.halfverse: “There is no help for him in his God.”
value.verse: How many there are who say of me, *

value.halfverse: you are my glory, the one who lifts up my head.
value.verse: But you, O LORD, are a shield about me; *

value.halfverse: and he answers me from his holy hill;
value.verse: I call aloud upon the LORD, *
I lie down and go to sleep; *
value.halfverse: I wake again, because the LORD sustains me.

value.verse: I do not fear the multitudes of people *
value.halfverse: who set themselves against me all around.

value.verse: Rise up, O LORD; set me free, O my God; *
value.halfverse:
surely, you will strike all my enemies across the face,
 you will break the teeth of the wicked.
Your blessing be upon your people!
